summary: This document appears to be a deposit account opening application from Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas. It outlines various account types, customer identification policies, and terms and conditions for account holders. The document emphasizes compliance with anti-money laundering regulations and the responsibilities of clients regarding their financial activities.
keyFacts: The document is a deposit account opening application for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
It includes various account types such as checking, money market, and certificate of deposit accounts.
The application emphasizes the importance of customer identification to combat money laundering and terrorism financing.
Clients are required to notify the bank of any changes to their personal or institutional information.
The document includes terms and conditions that clients must agree to when opening an account.
